name: BOMBER 2
description:
This is a remake of a classic game "Bomber". You are a pilot of a bomber aircraft that drift down over a city and drop bombs. There are two outcomes for you: to demolish a whole town and get to the next level or to crash into a building and lose the game. The game features all potentials of OpenGL ES: beautifully animated explosions, collapse of buildings, detailed objects - all effects are stunning.

"The game graphics makes use of Open GL capabilities and shows cool animations of explosion and buildings collapsing."
- www.topiphoneresource.info

If you like this game, check our Bad Santa Bomber for more!
